Name: Together as One!
Description: Elite Shout. (3...13...15 seconds.) All party members near you or your pet deal +5...13...15 damage and gain +1...6...7 Health regeneration. PvE Skill

Name: Barrage

Description: Stance. (5...10...11 seconds.) You attack 25% faster. Your non-attack skills are disabled (5 seconds).

Description: Skill. Your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. Failure unless Beast Mastery 8 or higher.
